products.title: Stirlo Hot Pink
products.description: Stirlohot pink plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

products.title: Konya Blackout Hot Pink
products.description: Konya blackout hot pink plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade.

products.title: Carnival Paradise Pink
products.description: Carnival paradise pink made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Carnival Blackout Paradise Pink
products.description: Carnival blackout paradise pink made to measure roller blind.
